Articles.Content: Does Krags planet factory mod have science? I don't have it installed on my current version, it's in my downloads folder somewhere, but can anyone tell me if Krags planet factory Planets actually have science or not.

Sadly no when you do science at the planets and moons your can do the experiment bit you get 0 science, but they are still great for exploring. Maybe in the future there will be why to do science will the planets and moons from krags planet factory
I am also wondering if they have kethane located on them. Who cares about the science when you got the great views!
If the body science params isn't null, but just zeroed out, you can use RSS to change those values.

Thinking of Krag's planet mod, could you put up a download link as the official one has been down for some time now, and i'd really like to check out those planets. (I also want to crash into the rings of that blue planet who's name currently elludes me to see if they are solid)
Check the Kerbal Spaceport. That's where I got mine.

I am also wondering if they have kethane located on them. Who cares about the science when you got the great views!

Kethane is not added to Krags additions by default....that having been said its really very simple to include them. The kethane wiki/api page has details on how to do that.
